author: SPACOD

text: get them from the game directory they are in .ogg format i guess you can convert them or use vlc to play them :)
author: 1q3er5

text: did you ever play the first Unreal Tournament? As good as the other games in the series were the soundtrack for the original stands head and shoulders above really.
author: T 86 Nighthawk

text: Best online shooter series of all time. To this day nothing has come remotely close to Unreal for me.
author: ZeroTeran

text: I miss playing UT2004 online.  Some of the most fun times I have had in gaming.
author: assgoblin2damax

text:
sheesh. playing UT2k4 was so long ago, i forgot most of the soundtracks =(

author: BlueLegion

text: I remember in computer class in high school, everyone would launch Unreal Tournament and we'd play for the first 15 minutes of class. Fun times.
author: tttc

text: Foregone Destruction is my favourite song of the series, but I like this one too, very atmospheric.
author: TheGreenEclipse

text: That's right!  About time this song got some recognition. One of my favorite songs from UT 2004 along with Tokara Forest.
author: Xegan

text: I only owned the demo of this game...a few years after it's prime time.  I loved the demo.  I wanted to try out Unreal Tournament 3, but I heard that it wasn't that good, so I wanted to wait for the next one.  However, chances are, we aren't going to get another one for a long while.  Damnit Epic.
author: ParrotMan01

text: @SupraDarky Hey Supra, did you get Super Mario 3D Land today?
author: BigMacOpossum

text: I had a lot of fun with this game at the time. I remember being blown away by the graphics when 2003 came out. I've always been a fan of this track, which at first feels like a more upbeat version of Tokara Forest. It has some really nice progession and great melodies.
author: SupraDarky
